str2: And, even, also, namely.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To hear, listen, comprehend by hearing; pass: is heard, reported. A primary verb; to hear.
Large, great, in the widest sense.
Probably akin to phaino through the idea of disclosure; a tone; by implication, an address, saying or language.
From out, out from among, from, suggesting from the interior outwards. A primary preposition denoting origin, from, out.
Perhaps from the same as oros; the sky; by extension, heaven; by implication, happiness, power, eternity; specially, the Gospel.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Genitive Feminine Singular
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.

parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To go up, mount, ascend; of things: I rise, spring up, come up. From ana and the base of basis; to go up.
From an adverb form of hode; in this same spot, i.e. Here or hither.
And, even, also, namely.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To go up, mount, ascend; of things: I rise, spring up, come up. From ana and the base of basis; to go up.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.
Perhaps from the same as oros; the sky; by extension, heaven; by implication, happiness, power, eternity; specially, the Gospel.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A cloud. From nephos; properly, cloudiness, i.e. a cloud.
And, even, also, namely.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
Hated, hostile; subst: an enemy. From a primary echtho; hateful; usually as a noun, an adversary.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From a derivative of theaomai; to be a spectator of, i.e. Discern, (experience) or intensively (acknowledge).

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
